publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Isaiah 23
ab.l: Navilik Cor üč́uń syjyt ėt́arĺar geŕabĺari Taršiš́niń ki talandy juv́ bolmaḥtan keĺḿakt́ań jerińd́ań Kitimniń olǯalamaḥ kelir alarɣa.
Tyjylyjyz olturuvčulary otračnyn b́eźarǵani Cidonnun ašar t́eńgiźni tolturur any.
Da artmaɣy urlu- ɣunun Mićriniń suvlary Šiḥornun da b́urt́uǵu (urluɣunun) oraɣynyn Niĺniń da bolur satuvuna ḱop uluslarnyn.
Ujatly bolur Cidon ki ajtyr t́eńgiź ḱuč́ĺu ol t́eńgiź ajtadoɣoč syzlamadym da t́oŕaḿadim da ulɣajtmadym da öśt́urḿadim ėgit́ĺar da boj qyzlar.
Ki ńečik qaltradylar ėšitip jaman ḥabaryn Mićriniń alej qaltradylar ėšitip ḥabaryn Cornun.
Ašajyz Taršiš́ḱa syjyt ėtijiz olturuv- čulary otračnyn.
Bumudur siźǵa šatyrlyḥ avalɣy vaḥtlardan avaldan ėlt́adirĺar jyraḥtan tirilḿa.
Kim keńaš́ ėt́timo Cor üśt́u- ńa ol taǯlanɣan ki b́eźarǵańĺari anyn aɣalyḥlar b́eźarǵańĺari anyn syjlylary kibik jerniń.
H T́eńrisi ćevaʾotnun keńaš́ ėt́ti jeńgiĺ ėt́ḿa ulluluɣun bar ḱorkńuń jeńgiĺ ėt́ḿa bar syjlylaryn jerniń.
Ašḥyn jerijd́a Niĺ kibik ǯymatyna Taršiš́niń bolmas kiplik artyḥ.
Ḥyššymyn sundu ol t́eńgiź üśt́uńa qaltratty bijlikĺarni H bujurdu Kenaʿan üč́uń tas ėt́ḿa kiplikĺariń.
Da ajtty arttyrmassyn artyḥ šatyrlanma ol zulumlanɣan boj ǯymaty Cidonnun turɣun ašḥyn Kitimǵa daɣy anda da tynč bol- mastyr saja.
Muna jeri Kašdimniń bu ulus joɣedi Ašur bun- jat otračlarɣa turɣuzdular parqanlaryn syndyrdylar sarajlaryn qojdular aḥtarylmaḥqa.
Syjyt ėtijiź geŕabĺari Taršiš́niń ki talandy kipligijiź.
Da bolur ol ḱuńd́a da unutulur Cor jet́- miš́ jyl jyllaryn kibik bir bijniń sofundan jet́miš́ jylnyn bolur Corɣa jeri kibik ol azuvču qatynnyn.
Alyjyz qobuz quršaɣyn azɣan šaharny unutulɣanny jaḥšy ėt́kiń čalma arttyrɣyn jir anyn üč́uń ki saɣynylgejsyn.
Da bolur sofundan jet́miš́ jylnyn saɣynyr H Cornu da qajtyr ḱuč́uńa da satuv ėt́ar bar bijlikĺa- riń ol jerniń juźlari üśt́uńa ol jerniń.
Da bolur b́eźarǵańli- gi da b́erńa b́erirmiń any H-ɣa ḥazna qojulmas da mal yštyrylmas ki olturuvčularɣa alnynda H-nyn bolur b́eźarǵańligi. ašama tojɣunča da jabunma bahaly upraḥ byla.
